transit_routes.name: Fullers Ferry to Waiheke
transit_routes.note: Ferries from downtown terminal. Wine tours and bike rentals on island.

transit_routes.name: Waterfront Walk
transit_routes.note: All downtown attractions walkable from terminal. Flat and easy.

featured_experiences.name: Waiheke Island Wine Tour
featured_experiences.note: 35-min ferry then wine tour bus or bike rental. Book ahead for winery lunches.

featured_experiences.name: Sky Tower Experience
featured_experiences.note: NZ's tallest structure. Observation deck, revolving restaurant, or extreme activities.

featured_experiences.name: Mount Eden Sunrise/Sunset
featured_experiences.note: Auckland's highest volcano. Easy walk up. Best at golden hour. Free.
